law.catch_line: No carrier is subject to any of the penalties of this subtitle, except the penalties for a violation...
law.text:
No carrier is subject to any of the penalties of this subtitle, except the penalties for a violation of § 4-206, § 4-213, § 4-214, or § 4-215 of this subtitle, if he receives, carries, holds, or delivers in the usual course of business as a carrier, poultry or poultry products owned by another person, unless:
The carrier has knowledge or is in possession of facts which would cause a reasonable person to believe any article was not inspected or marked pursuant to this subtitle, or the article is not eligible for transportation in intrastate commerce; or
The carrier refuses to furnish, on request of the Secretary, the name and address of the person from whom he received the article or a copy of any document pertaining to the delivery of the article to the carrier.
